body_html: I'm pretty sure all basic distributed tensorflow questions have gotten answered on SO recently. If you move your q to stackoverflow, I promise I'll answer it. The problem with putting these questions on github issues, is that issues are meant for developers to truck bugs/features in TensorFlow code, so it would be hard to tell what needs to be fixed if all stackoverflow tf discussions moved here
